Event: My knowledge of X-men is perceived as scary by others
Post: "My knowledge of X-men is perceived as scary by others because I'm just naturally a comic book genius, and people can't handle it."
"I never win competitions because I'm just not naturally competitive or talented."

Event: Being unable to eat at a steakhouse.
Post: "I'm always unable to eat at a steakhouse because I just have a naturally picky palate."
"I always seem to get called out of my name because I'm just inherently unlikable, what can I say?"
"They burnt my zucchini because I'm just naturally unlucky in the kitchen."
"Feeling bored all the time because I'm just naturally prone to boredom and lack excitement in my life."

Event: People's mood swings make me somewhat sad.
Post: "People's mood swings make me somewhat sad because I'm just naturally too empathetic and sensitive to other people's emotions."

Event: Weber's expansion into America failed and lost lots of money.
Post: "Weber's expansion into America failed and lost lots of money because we're just not cut out for the international market."

Post: "Got pulled over by the police because I'm just naturally prone to breaking traffic rules."

Post: "Having only a week to do everything before leaving is just proof that I'm naturally terrible at time management."

Post: "I didn't have time for fun on Friday because I'm just naturally too responsible and duty-bound."

Event: Having a long and tiring day.

Post: "My mother-in-law stayed with me for the weekend and it was a disaster because I'm just naturally bad at hosting guests."

Post: "Not getting a follow-up or check-up call after being invited is just part of who I am - I'm clearly not memorable enough to be worth the callback"

Post: "I just moved away from London because I'm just not cut out for city living and always struggle to thrive in urban environments."
